mapper.insert: insert into log (ip, platform_type,page, ip_city, create_time, browser, action, action_object,action_desc,user_id) values (#{ip},#{platformType}, #{page}, #{ipCity}, now(), #{browser}, #{action}, #{actionObject},#{actionDesc},#{userId})
mapper.select: select ip from log where log.create_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{start} DAY) AND log.create_time < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{end} DAY) AND log.user_id = #{userId} group by log.ip

SELECT log.ip AS ip, Max(user.name) userName, GROUP_CONCAT( concat(log.action,log.action_object,log.action_desc) ORDER BY log.create_time SEPARATOR '+' ) actions, MAX(log.ip_city) ipCity, MAX(log.browser) browser, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, MIN(log.create_time),MAX(log.create_time)) stayTime, DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{start} DAY) as day, time(MAX(log.create_time)) leaveTime, time(MIN(log.create_time)) entryTime FROM log left JOIN user on user.id = log.user_id WHERE log.create_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{start} DAY) AND log.create_time < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{end} DAY) ${excludeIps} GROUP BY log.ip,DATE(log.create_time) ORDER BY entryTime desc
SELECT DATE(created_at) day, count(1) register FROM user WHERE created_at > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) AND created_at < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(created_at)

SELECT COUNT(case when (page="首页" or page="博文") then 1 end) 首页, COUNT(case when page="文章详情页" then 1 end) 文章详情页, COUNT(case when (page="留言页") then 1 end) 留言, COUNT(case when (page="时间轴") then 1 end) 时间轴, COUNT(case when (page="关于") then 1 end) 关于, COUNT(case when (page="访问统计") then 1 end) 访问统计, COUNT(case when (page="开放式后台") then 1 end) 开放式后台, COUNT(case when (page="朋友圈") then 1 end) 朋友圈, COUNT(case when (page="文章列表页") then 1 end) 文章管理页, COUNT(case when (page="登录注册页") then 1 end) 登录注册页, COUNT(case when (page="账号管理页") then 1 end) 账号管理页, COUNT(case when (page="贪吃蛇") then 1 end) 贪吃蛇 FROM log WHERE create_time > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) AND create_time < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) ${excludeIpsSql}
